message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $13,000. Could we perhaps agree on $11,000?
